thread.title: Microsoft gives Ahmed Mohamed package of gifts, wants to see what he can do with it
thread.title_full: Microsoft gives Ahmed Mohamed package of gifts, wants to see what he can do with it - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft gives Ahmed Mohamed package of gifts, wants to see what he can do with it
text: Ahmed Mohamed , the 14-year-old student who was arrested for bringing a digital clock he built to his high school last week, is getting support from Microsoft, which went a step beyond kind words and invitations by sending him a big bag of geeky goodies. Â»
